amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $100,000 from being used for the small business incubator project of the University of West Georgia in Carrollton, Georgia, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $100,000 from being used for the small business incubator project of the University of West Georgia in Carrollton, Georgia, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 342 (Roll no. 559).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 342 (Roll no. 559).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
